name: Scarecrow Swarm
description:
In this king of the hill type fighting game play as Clyde, a masked protagonist who intimidates his victims with a scarecrow mask.  Knockdown light posts, to pick up crows that will help aid you in combat and gather a swarm.  Fight mobs to delay the inevitable.... your death.

Controls:

W, A, S, D or Arrow Keys for Movement

Left-Mouse Button to Attack

Shift/Spacebar to Roll

Q to pick up crows

E to pick up weapons

Backspace to Pause

Enter to Resume

Escape to Quit
